column1: Uchi////Have visited multiple times.  My teen daughters love it
column3: last visit not what we expected.  Went for my daughter's 14th birthday - pretty impressive that she chose this restaurant.  Was not expecting a song and dance but her bday was barely acknowledged - would have expected comped dessert for a repeat customer.  Also
column4: the server basically just placed the food on the table without explanation - in the past
column5: great waiters have given lots of explanation - we love to know the unique items that we are eating.  I guess she figured she didn't need to do that for a repeat customer.  Food good as usual - love the brussel sprouts
column8: ham and eggs!  take better care of your loyal customers......
